context: I love the book The Hunger Games series. Do you know any books similar to it?

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of book?
I love adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, futuristic sci-fi, and suspenseful thriller all in one movie! Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I'm so excited to discover new movies and get some thrilling recommendations! Can't wait to see what the recommender suggests.

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "The Maze Runner" for its adrenaline-pumping action, thrilling adventure, and suspenseful thriller set in a futuristic sci-fi world.
That sounds awesome! Can you tell me more about "The Maze Runner"?
context.feelings: Wow, "The Maze Runner" sounds like it has everything I'm looking for! I can't wait to find out more about it.

context.content: "The Maze Runner" is a gripping dystopian novel by James Dashner, featuring a group of boys trapped in a mysterious maze with no memory of their past. It's filled with intense action, suspense, and a thrilling plot that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

That sounds amazing! I can't wait to dive into "The Maze Runner" and experience the intense action and suspense in the futuristic sci-fi world. It seems to cover all the genres I love, so I'm definitely accepting this recommendation! [END]
